abstract: News Analysis; Pres Obama's decision to keep American troops in Afghanistan tacitly acknowledges disastrous withdrawal from Iraq; speech draws contrast between cooperative Afghan regime and frayed relations with Baghdad in 2011; many experts expected, and applauded, president's reversal, while antiwar activists decry it.
lead_paragraph: Four years after pulling troops out of Iraq, only to watch it collapse into war again, President Obama is opting for a different course in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Lessons of Iraq Loom Over Obama’s Decision to Keep Troops in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Afghan Shift Tied to Iraq Meltdown

snippet: Four years after pulling troops out of Iraq, only to watch it collapse into war again, President Obama is opting for a different course in Afghanistan.
